predictions.text: Gold (XAUUSD spot) will trade at or above $2,450 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any reputable price feed (e.g., Yahoo Finance: XAUUSD=X, TradingView, Bloomberg) shows XAUUSD high >= 2450.00 on a UTC calendar day by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Geopolitical risk spikes (Middle East, East Asia)
predictions.rationale: Softening real yields and episodic risk aversion can lift gold to fresh highs even amid mixed macro data.

predictions.text: ICE BofA US High Yield Option-Adjusted Spread (FRED: BAMLH0A0HYM2) will close at or above 4.75% on at least one day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series BAMLH0A0HYM2 daily close shows value >= 4.75% by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Primary HY issuance tone and concessions
predictions.rationale: Growth jitters and policy uncertainty can prompt a temporary risk-off widening in credit spreads.

predictions.text: PHLX Semiconductor Index (SOX) will close at or above 5,300 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Nasdaq PHLX official close of SOX index >= 5300.0 on any trading day before deadline.
predictions.rationale: AI capex momentum supports semis; however, rates and export controls temper upside, keeping odds near-balanced.

predictions.text: U.S. AAA national average regular gasoline will be at or below $3.15/gal in at least one daily reading by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: AAA Gas Prices daily national average regular shown at https://gasprices.aaa.com/ is <= $3.15 on any date by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: NY Harbor RBOB futures and crack spreads
EIA weekly gasoline inventories and demand
Seasonal blends and regional price dispersion
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand fade, steady refinery runs, and softer crude should pressure retail gasoline lower into late November.

predictions.text: Cboe SKEW Index will close at or below 120.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Cboe reported daily close for SKEW index (SKEW) is <= 120.0 by the deadline.
predictions.rationale: Periods of complacency and reduced tail-hedging often drive SKEW downticks, especially if markets stabilize post-earnings.

predictions.text: U.S. 3-Month Treasury bill yield (FRED: DGS3MO) will close at or below 5.20% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series DGS3MO daily close <= 5.20% by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Bill supply dynamics and cash-balance plans
ON RRP usage and repo rates
predictions.rationale: Incremental pricing of 2026 cuts and supportive funding markets could nudge front-end yields slightly lower.

predictions.text: EUR/USD will trade at or above 1.1000 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Any reputable FX feed (e.g., Yahoo Finance: EURUSD=X, Refinitiv) shows intraday high >= 1.1000 on a UTC calendar day by the deadline.
predictions.rationale: A softer dollar on moderating U.S. data and steady ECB rhetoric could briefly carry EUR/USD to 1.10.

predictions.text: Ethereum (ETH-USD) will trade at or below $2,700 on at least one UTC day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: CoinDesk, CoinMarketCap, or Yahoo Finance (ETH-USD) shows intraday low <= 2700.00 on a UTC day before the deadline.
monitoring_signals: BTC dominance and macro risk sentiment
predictions.rationale: Recent downside momentum and episodic DeFi risks raise chances of another leg lower despite broader crypto interest.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-08, Congress will pass and the President will sign a funding measure (CR or appropriations) that reopens the federal government through at least 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Public law enacted and White House signing statement; OMB/OPM guidance indicates shutdown ended and agencies reopen with funding through >= 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: House/Senate floor schedules and rule filings
Leadership whips and public whip counts
predictions.rationale: High political costs of prolonged shutdown and mounting program disruptions increase pressure for a short-term funding patch.

predictions.text: ISM Services Employment Index for October 2025 will print between 50.0 and 52.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: Institute for Supply Management’s October 2025 Services Report shows Employment subindex in [50.0, 52.0].
monitoring_signals: S&P Global U.S. services PMI employment component
predictions.rationale: Services hiring likely modest, consistent with cooling labor demand without sharp contraction.

predictions.text: U.S. CPI Owners’ Equivalent Rent (OER, MoM, SA) for October 2025 will print between 0.3% and 0.4% in the BLS release due mid-November.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS CPI detailed tables show OER MoM SA change in [0.3%, 0.4%] for October 2025.
monitoring_signals: Zillow Observed Rent Index (new-lease rent growth)
Shelter CPI diffusion in prior months
predictions.rationale: Lagged pass-through from cooler new-lease rents keeps OER gradually easing but still elevated month-to-month.

predictions.text: U.S. On-Highway Diesel Fuel (EIA national average) will be at or below $3.95/gal in at least one weekly update by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: EIA’s weekly On-Highway Diesel Fuel Prices (U.S. average) shows <= $3.95/gal in any report released by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Distillate inventory levels and days of supply
predictions.rationale: Seasonal softness and adequate distillate stocks can pull retail diesel modestly lower absent refinery disruptions.
